title: Create CHANGELOG.md
description: Create CHANGELOG.md documenting v1.0.0 features: AI-powered playlist generation (3 providers), YouTube search + playlist URL, interactive setup, config management. Follow Keep a Changelog format.

comments.text: Created CHANGELOG.md for v1.0.0 following Keep a Changelog format. Covers all features, known issues, and links.
Approved: CHANGELOG follows Keep a Changelog. Update macOS-only known issue since cross-platform is now fixed.
